flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Il raffole du minerai de fer. Il défend son territoirenen chargeant avec son corps d’acier.
LAIRON tempers its steel body byndrinking highly nutritious mineralnspringwater until it is bloated.fThis POKéMON makes its nest close tonsprings of delicious water.
LAIRON feeds on iron contained innrocks and water. It makes its nest onnmountains where iron ore is buried.fAs a result, the POKéMON often clashesnwith humans mining the iron ore.
When two LAIRON meet in the wild, theynfight for territory by bashing into eachnother with their steel bodies. The soundnof their collision carries for miles.
It habitually shows off its strength withnthe size of sparks it creates by rammingnits steel body into boulders.
It habitually shows off its strength withnthe size of sparks it creates by rammingnits steel body into boulders.
For food, it digs up iron ore. Itnsmashes its steely body againstnothers to fight over territory.
For food, it digs up iron ore. Itnsmashes its steely body againstnothers to fight over territory.
For food, it digs up iron ore. Itnsmashes its steely body againstnothers to fight over territory.
It loves iron ore. Groups of themnfight for territory by bashing onenanother with their steel bodies.
It loves iron ore. Groups of themnfight for territory by bashing onenanother with their steel bodies.
Il se nourrit du minerai de fer qu’ilnfore. Il défend son territoire ennchargeant avec son corps d’acier.
For food, it digs up iron ore. Itnsmashes its steely body againstnothers to fight over territory.
Il se nourrit du minerai de fer qu’ilnfore. Il défend son territoire ennchargeant avec son corps d’acier.
For food, it digs up iron ore. Itnsmashes its steely body againstnothers to fight over territory.
Lairon fight over territory,nand when their steel bodiesncollide, sparks fly.
Lairon fight over territory,nand when their steel bodiesncollide, sparks fly.
てっこうせきが　だいこうぶつ。nはがねの　からだを　ぶつけあってnなわばり　あらそいを　する。
철광석을 매우 좋아한다.n강철의 몸을 서로 부딪치며n영역 싸움을 한다.
Ist verrückt nach Eisenerz. Bei Revierkämpfennstoßen Stollrak einander mit ihren Stahlkörpern.
Le encanta comer hierro. Lucha por su territorionembistiendo a sus rivales con su cuerpo de acero.
Adora i minerali di ferro. Scaglia il suo corpo d’acciaioncontro gli altri nella lotta per il territorio.
It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territorynby bashing one another with their steel bodies.
鉄鉱石が　大好物。n鋼の　体を　ぶつけ合ってn縄張り　争いを　する。
はがねの　よろいを　いわに　ぶつけたnときに　でる　ひばなの　おおきさでnつよさを　アピールする　しゅうせい。
강철의 갑옷을 바위에 부딪쳤을 때n튀는 불꽃의 크기로n강함을 어필하는 습성이 있다.
Pour montrer sa force à ses ennemis, Galegon frottenson corps d’acier contre les rochers pour produirende gigantesques étincelles.
Gelegentlich demonstriert es seine Kraft, indem esnmit der Größe der Funken angibt, die entstehen,nwenn es seinen stählernen Körper in Felsen rammt.
Para alardear de su fuerza, hace saltar chispasnfrotando contra grandes rocas el cuerpo de aceronque tiene.
Per sfoggiare la sua potenza, crea grandi scintillenscontrandosi contro i massi con il suo corpo d’acciaio.
It habitually shows off its strength with the size ofnsparks it creates by ramming its steel bodyninto boulders.
鋼の　よろいを　岩に　ぶつけたnときに　出る　火花の　大きさでn強さを　アピールする　習性。
えいよう　まんてんの　わきみずを　おなかいっぱいnのむ　ことで　はがねの　からだが　きたえられる。nおいしい　わきみずの　ちかくに　すを　つくる。
영양 만점인 샘물을 배 속 가득n마셔서 강철 몸을 단련시킨다.n맛있는 샘물 가까이에 거처를 만든다.
Galegon adoucit son corps d’acier en buvant une eau minéralenjusqu’à ce qu’il soit tout boursouflé. Ce Pokémon fait son nidnprès des sources d’eau minérale riches en nutriments.

Stollrak temperiert seinen Körper, indem es ausgesprochennnahrhaftes Quellwasser trinkt, bis es völlig aufgebläht ist.nDieses Pokémon baut sein Nest in der Nähe von Quellen,naus denen köstliches Wasser sprudelt.
Lairon templa su cuerpo de acero bebiendo agua mineral muynrica en nutrientes hasta que no puede más. Este Pokémonnsuele crear su nido cerca de manantiales de rica agua.

Lairon tempra la sua fibra d’acciaio ingerendo dosi enormindi minerali altamente nutritivi presenti nell’acqua di sorgente.nQuesto Pokémon crea la propria dimora nei pressi di sorgentind’acqua purissima.
Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritiousnmineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes itsnnest close to springs of delicious water.
栄養　満点の　わき水を　お腹いっぱいn飲む　ことで　鋼の　体が　鍛えられる。n美味しい　わき水の　近くに　巣を　つくる。
いしや　みずに　ふくまれる　てつぶんを　たべる。nてっこうせきの　うもれた　やまに　すを　つくるがnてつを　とりにくる　にんげんと　あらそいになる。
돌이나 물에 포함된 철 성분을 먹는다.n철광석이 묻힌 산에 둥지를 만들지만n철을 캐러 오는 인간과 다투게 된다.

Galegon se nourrit du fer contenu dans les rochers etndans l’eau. Il fait son nid sur les montagnes renfermantndu minerai de fer. Du coup, il se confronte souventnaux humains travaillant dans les mines.
Stollrak ernährt sich von Eisen, das in Steinen und Wassernenthalten ist. Es baut sein Nest in Bergen, in denen Eisenerznabgebaut wird. Es gerät dabei häufig mit Bergarbeiternnin Konflikt.

Lairon se alimenta del hierro que hay en las rocas y el agua.nHace su nido en las montañas, de donde se saca el hierro.nPor eso, se encuentra muchas veces con las personas quenestán trabajando en las minas extrayéndolo.

Lairon si nutre del ferro contenuto nelle rocce e nell’acqua.nCrea la propria dimora in montagna vicino a giacimenti ferrosi.nPer questo motivo il Pokémon si scontra spesso con minatorinalla ricerca di pepite di ferro.
Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makesnits nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result,nthe Pokémon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.
石や　水に　含まれている　鉄分を　食べる。n鉄鉱石の　埋もれた　山に　巣を　つくるがn鉄を　取りに来る　人間と　争いになる。
